title_short: (39160) Ribamontán al Mar - 21 Calle Bajada a la Playa
description: During the day it's fine, but very crowded and at night teenagers come with loud music and some throw firecrackers. Keep in mind that my experience was in August.

name: Camping Derby Loredo
title: (39160) Camping Derby Loredo
description: Camping Derby Loredo

title: (39694) Santa María de Cayón - 32 Barrio Santa María de Cayón
title_short: (39694) Santa María de Cayón - 32 Barrio Santa María de Cayón
description: Perfect for Saturday or Sunday

title: (39477) Oruña de Piélagos - 13 Barrio el Puente
title_short: (39477) Oruña de Piélagos - 13 Barrio el Puente
description: Very good spot understand the trees. We stopped there in a very hot day and it really helped us! Drinking water and tables, close to the river.

title: (39120) - 422 Barrio Liencres
description: High Liencres park, equipped with a parking lot for children, barbecues, fountain, benches and table. We spent the night very calm when arriving there was neither van nor caravan and waking up there were two camping- cars and another van. 5 minutes from Lens beach, supermarkets and restaurants.

title: (39470) - 4D Barrio Renedo
description: Water source.

title: (39626) Santa María de Cayón - N-634
description: Service area for loading and unloading, next to the highway and next to a gas station. ideal for a stop on the road. Small shop and restaurant

title: (39160) Loredo - 104B Barrio Monte Mazo
description: Trankila area, large lawn to get the dogs out, Skate park, Bmx circuit and near the beach and shops

title: (39716) Entrambasaguas - 7 Barrio la Sierra
description: Gas station to sleep, you can fill water in the one in front and empty it, how bad are cars

title: (39715) Entrambasaguas - 13A Barrio Elechino
description: Picnic area away from the highway. The entrance is along a fairly narrow street. There are 5 tables and a games area. The place is surrounded by residential buildings but everything is quiet and peaceful.

title: (39160) Ribamontán al Mar - 98 Barrio el Bosque
title_short: (39160) Ribamontán al Mar - 98 Barrio el Bosque
description: Very quiet and nice place at the end of a street. Great view over the sea with direct access to the beach. Parking is free and very close to all surf schools.

title: (39160) Langre - 87 Barrio el Bosque
description: Small side road for day time parking and to spend the night (or two). The police might pass by but won’t say anything. There is a small path down to the beach. Beautiful hiking trail along the cliffs is only a 2 min walk from here. The town is close by as well where you can find small local stores and restaurants. No services available so make sure to stock up before you come here. Spot is great for both vans and bigger motorhomes.

title: (39120) Liencres - 14 CA-231
description: Laundry, washing and 3 drying. also corresponds to a playground

title: (39120) - 21 Barrio la Arnía
description:
Parking recently opened by the town hall.
Vehicles weighing more than 3,500kg and not more than 5.5m in length are not allowed to enter.
It is shared with cars and is dirt on a sloping plot

title: (39727) Extremera -
description: Parking on the edge of the road, at the foot of the Via Ferrata of the "torreón de liérganes". There is space for 6 vans or 8 cars. Beautiful views.

name: Camping Arnia
title: (39120) Camping Arnia
description: Camping Arnia with very beautiful views, 5 minutes by car from Liencres and very close to the Dunas de Liencres Natural Park and numerous beaches in the area, they allow pets and everything is well cared for. Prices: 6 euros adult   6 euros car, 9 van and 14 motorhome.

title: (39120) Santander - 8 Barrio la Arnía
description: Small fenced plot which in high season you have to pay for a quiet sea view with restaurants next door. Without services but with a spectacular location. Open from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (39478) - Barrio Solarana
description: Very quiet place next to the river, the only noise besides birds and some pedestrians is that of the A67 in the distance. Recommended to spend one night. There are no services, arc bridge is a 20min walk, a very lonely walk. You park on the side of a little or very little frequented road.

title: (39160) - 53-37 Barrio el Bosque
description: Good place. Sunset. end of July and nobody was there. Big mosquitoes.

title: (39160) - 31 Barrio el Bosque
description: Nice and quiet parking space, with beautiful views. Mid-August and very empty.

title: (39120) - CA-305
description: Parking of the natural park of the Dunas de Liencres. There is a very nice 5 minute walk to the beach through the forest.

title: (39120) - 3N Barrio Manzanedo
description: Sporty area, very quiet to sleep. Not too far from the beach

title: (39720) - 74A Avenida Alisas
description: Picnic area with very shaded parking, children's play area, trash can, barbecues, two fountains but without taps (awaiting repair) stream, we did not sleep but I do not think there is a problem, municipal swimming pool 1 km or less.

title: (39715) Entrambasaguas - 119 Barrio el Sedillo
description: Parking for all types of motorhomes. Near the city, quiet and relaxed place, gym and swimming pool 15m

title: (39120) Liencres - 479 Barrio Liencres
description: Parking between eucalyptus and pine trees. Pass paved road nearby, but very quiet. Several walking routes depart from the site. nearby beach

title: (39694) Santa María de Cayón - Barrio Ruda - Totero
title_short: (39694) Santa María de Cayón - Barrio Ruda - Totero
description:
Very quiet, near a river bank. The bridge is pedestrian. Only for Van as the turn from the road is very steep and narrow. You can return at the end only. 
Super calm mais seulement pour Van.

title: (39470) Renedo de Piélagos - 2 Barrio Sorribero Bajo
title_short: (39470) Renedo de Piélagos - 2 Barrio Sorribero Bajo
description: There is a lot of free space during the holiday season. You eat very well in the restaurant that is right next to the level crossing, "El Jardín de Victoria".

title: (39470) Renedo de Piélagos - 24 Carretera de la Mies
title_short: (39470) Renedo de Piélagos - 24 Carretera de la Mies
description: Public parking

title: (39660) La Cueva - 3A Diseminado la Cueva
description: Small square to spend a quiet night. there is a fount. It is the village cemetery, few quieter places will be

title: (39470) - 6B Barrio Sorribero Bajo
description: Quiet and beautiful place, perfect for dogs, next to a river with very nice places to rest, good parking without height limit, clean perfect for dogs, nature

title: (39120) Cantabria - 17 Barrio la Caseta
description: It is a normal street, quite inclined, but perfect for leaving the motorhome and going to Cerrias beach. Spectacular views, very cool beach but with algae. fine sand and turquoise waters.

title: (39120) Somacuevas - 27 Barrio la Caseta
description: Small parking on beach with spectacular views. In two minutes, we went down to the sea. Very quiet with shops, bars and restaurants within 500 metres.

title: (39120) Liencres - CA-305
description: Large asphalt parking lot surrounded by a huge forest. Day  without problems. There are taps with drinking water but no thread. There is a path to walk through the forest. Quiet and beautiful place to rest.

title: (39120) Liencres - 1A Barrio la Caseta
description: Day and night parking in front of a garden area with tables and a playground. It is very close to a cliff that is usually full and it is difficult to get space. The area is quiet, not many cars pass by as it is almost the end of a road. It is a good alternative to spend the night in a community that usually prohibits sleeping everywhere.

name: Ocio La Flor
title: (39626) Ocio La Flor
description: Parking space on the farm, nice host. toilet available. Great for kids. 2 hectares of corn maze for children and adults. Kiosk, bar, soccer field, archery, visit to the cow farm and the opportunity to bottle feed the calves. You can swim in the nearby river.

title: (39120) [no name] - 7 Barrio la Caseta
description: Parking playa de Somocuevas, beautiful view, oceanfront, very quiet but windy place. Not tested in high season.

title: (39794) Anero - 7A Barrio la Sota
description: Petrol station with possibility of filling water because at the service area just before on the expressway, you can empty but not fill.

title: (39794) Hoz de Anero - 5D Barrio la Iglesia
title_short: (39794) Hoz de Anero - 5D Barrio la Iglesia
description: Quiet place behind the town hall, peaceful village to walk around, a bar opposite the station, with a fountain.

title: (39120) Liencres - CA-305
description:
Large car park on the beach renowned for surfing. A sign says that it is forbidden to spend the night, a lot of cars during the day but calm in the evening.

parked up evening of 21st June, big carpark, plenty of room in the evening, campers in for a few days parked over towards left as you enter. if you're a surfer you'll love it, safe for the average swimmer, if not a surfer or swimmer you still have to love it.

title: (39160) Langre - 51 Diseminado Langre
description: Huge parking used for both campers and cars, cost 3 euros for the whole day

title: (39160) Galizano - 119 Diseminado Carriazo
description: Car park Soccer field behind public car park, quiet place a little further away from the road.

title: (39160) Langre - 51 Diseminado Langre
description: Free parking with good access to the beach. No overnight stays. Clean up your stuff! Rangers will come by in the morning. You'll get warned even with a swimming trunks over the mirror you will be warned. Motorhomes are not allowed.

title: (39160) - 127A Diseminado Galizano
description: Public parking with spaces suitable for AC or van. Located in a super cool bar for a stop for adults and children.

title: (39160) - 51A Diseminado Langre
description: Wonderful place. Very calm. There are two different camps where you can park during the day (fee). Next to the cliff to the beach where there are stairs with access to the beach (nudism allowed and good for surfing). There is a prohibition indication to stay overnight.

title: (39660) - 83 Calle Pomaluengo
description: On the banks of the Pisueña River in Paluengo. (Cantabria). Quiet place with several sources of drinking water.

title: (39694) Esles - Bo. Esles
description:
Public parking, next to the church, very quiet area, with the river next to it.
Beautiful valley, with good routes. Very quiet place, since there are no cars. With shade, picnic tables and barbecue behind the church.

title: (39720) Cantabria - Av. Arriba-Alisas
description: Drinking water point with a parking space in front.

title: (39660) Socobio - 176A Diseminado Pomaluengo
description: CEPSA gas station, with showers included to give you a rinse, opened a month ago.

title: (39310) Gornazo - A-67 Salida 191,000 (Margen Derecho)
description: Private motorhome area with many services.

title: (39660) Pomaluengo - 117 Calle Pomaluengo
description: Recent area created by the municipality of Castañeda. Attached to the highway but at night it is quite quiet. It has a bike lane that takes you to the tourist town of Puente Viesgo and 1km in the other direction is the playground with a climbing wall and pump track. You have a loading and unloading service, ideal for making a stop along the way.

title: (39318) Gornazo - 13P Calle la Castañera
description: Clean, hot showers, friendly staff.. cafe food available

title: (39660) Castañeda - Socobio
description: Parking to visit the collegiate church of Santa Cruz de Castañeda. Quiet place, although you can hear the highway. Nearby there is a park for children. We liked it very much.

title: (39479) - 29A Barrio Valencia
description: Level esplanade with grass floor, several barbecues and a picnic table. Although there are surveillance cameras, there is no sign forbidden to stay overnight. We slept one day, the beautiful views.

title: (39660) Socobio - 35 Calle Socobio
description: Place which has no other interest than being in the shade because under the highway bridge.

title: (39160) Galizano - 140A Calle Verdes
description: Parking with a slight slope, very spacious and in the center.

title: (39679) - 115 Diseminado Vargas
description: Small shady place, directly on the river with access.

title: (39160) Galizano - 188 Diseminado Galizano
description: Free serial parking for 4 or 5 motorhomes. Slight incline in some points of the street. Good option to visit Galizano beach for motorhomes and vans with a height greater than 2 m. as the beach car parks are limited to 2 m

title: (39679) Vargas - 1061 Barrio Vargas
description: Parking in Vargas for cars, you can park and spend the night without problems.

title: (39160) Galizano - 1 Calle Romano
description: Drinking and fresh water source. It has a parking area and the fountain has an adapter for hoses. Cool!

title: (39679) Vargas - 1094 Barrio Vargas
description: Self-service laundry. Modern machines, clothes come out clean and smell good. Are there any alternatives. Easy parking at the Dia supermarket opposite.

title: (39160) Galizano - 27 Barrio Galizano
description: Beside the road

title: (39160) Galizano - 28 Barrio Galizano
description: Small car park in the forest overlooking the Galizano beach. A small path allows you to reach the beach in 5 minutes. Attention ! The police come every day! camping is prohibited!

title: (39160) - 77 CA-441
description: Daytime parking on the beach. There is no view of the sea, which is right next to it. Very nice beach. Cows, sheep and hills. Right next door there is a TEMPORARY PRIVATE PARKING summer from 10-22h where you can enter with a caravan, van, etc. and spend the day next to the beach and nature Small path in the middle of nature with a view of the sea.

title: (39160) Cantabria - 57A Diseminado Galizano
description: Nice place. Only accessible by small van or car. We have spent a night in the middle of nature. Way up and difficult to access with a large van or motorhome.

title: (39794) - 60 Diseminado Hoz
description: Nice parking next to the fast Road - day and night with a free service for camper. Great place to rest and stay for night. Parking dedicated for camping cars and cars with trailors. Toilets (8h30-18h), bins, playground, picnick places, dogs friendly.

title: (39312) - 1A Carretera Polanco
description:
Parking public du cimetière municipal, quartier très calme.
Couchers de soleil spectaculaires en hiver et vue sur Los Picos de Europa chaque jour clair.
Au centre du village il y a une petite épicerie, une autre avec des bonbons, un tabac avec des journaux, une banque Santander avec un distributeur automatique de billets et un musée dédié au patrimoine historique scolaire 
Localisation GPS des magasins: 43.385885, -4.016410

title: (39679) Puente Viesgo - 78 Diseminado Presillas
description: Ample parking next to the Church of San Nicolás. Picnic table and chairs. Very calm.

title: (39639) Saro - 35B Diseminado Saro de Abajo
description: Parking spot on the grass next to the pleasant shaded riverside picnic area. Not suitable for large motorhomes.
